rows.label: qst201506_msg0003
rows.name:
Mo-mo?! These are herbs
used to make poison, mo!

rows.label: qst201506_msg0004
rows.name: Herbs that only grow in Invidia.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0005
rows.name:
They are a dangerous type that
possess a potent poison.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0006
rows.name:
These herbs... They can
become a potent poison
depending on how ye use 'em.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0008
rows.name:
Now, what exactly were you
planning to do with this?

rows.label: qst201506_msg0010
rows.name:
Oh, is that so? ...Then you
won't mind if I stuff these
poisonous herbs into your mouth?

rows.label: qst201506_msg0012
rows.name:
We weren't told anything.
Just to gather Thanazalea.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0013
rows.name: If you want to know more, ask him.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0014
rows.name:
Him...? You mean the man
holed up in a hut on the
outskirts of Fons Maim?

rows.label: qst201506_msg0016
rows.name:
I can see everything. I've been
watching your every little misdeed...

rows.label: qst201506_msg0020
rows.name:
Fufufu... I'll take
that as a compliment.

rows.label: qst201506_msg0017
rows.name:
We're done with these two.
Let's go to the man holed
up at Blossomshade Cliff.
